section.section: A majority of the authorized membership of the Commission is a quorum.

The Commission may not do business unless:
there is a quorum; and
either the chairman or vice chairman is present.

text.section:
The Commission shall meet:
at least once every 2 months; and
when called by the chairman or the Secretary.

A member of the Commission:
may not receive compensation as a member of the Commission; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
